text: How to promote my template on marketplace?

like you would on any marketplace for templates. make sure the name and description are easily findable when searching, you could also put a link to your templates from your website, have a description, screenshots, maybe some documentation on your templates on your website
I've also seen people use Google Ads to promote a product in a marketplace listing before.
Paid sponsorship of the chrome extension? lol idk how that’d work but hey
might not be the right audience anyways for advertising a marketplace theme to anyways
Just take a google ad out on the exact search phrase of `HubSpot Developers`, `HubSpot development`, `HubSpot templates`, or anything that devs would search for
I would lean especially into `HubSpot templates` and `HubSpot theme` because developers may not be the right audience, marketers are probably the better audience to try to focus on
The businessses that choose to try to run their own stuff by just buying a template instead of hiring someone
lol i was referring to the chrome ext but yea for themes, def would want to focus on the themes portion
ohhhh lol yea not taking a google ad out for the chrome extension unless there was monetization behind it.  right now it’s just free

and to prevent anyone freaking out I have no plans to make the extension paid. I also feel any features added by other devs would always stay free unless they themselves wanted their functionality to be part of a paid version.

besides a paid version I don’t think would be the right way to monetize the extension. I think personally I’d rather have it be a sponsorship. The sponsor would get a “sponsored by company/product name” in the pop up of the extension a callout on the github and the web store description. Preferred sponsors would be HubSpot development related, like other tools.

Figuring out how to handle money with the extension would be hard too - since I personally feel everyone who contributed substantial amounts of work to the extension should be rewarded.
I think marketplace should be add a section of new product instead of user have to click dropdown to see it. That is may be fair for newer
How to get link product to send to my friend?
seem to it’s include my id
share the preview link, or if you are listed on marketplace you can search yourself on private window where you are not logged in and share that <@UF2TAQ0L8>
